mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_outgoing_opinion (doc_id, object_id, opinion, next_object_id, opinion_type, creator, create_date, name, position, level) VALUES (#{docId}, #{objectId}, #{opinion}, #{nextObjectId}, #{opinionType}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{name}, #{position}, #{level})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM doc_outgoing_opinion WHERE doc_id = #{docId} ORDER BY create_date ASC
